duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in structured Accelerated Sales Program to gain sales knowledge and expertise.
Generate viable sales leads and prospects through various channels.
Prepare and execute account plans and sell the value proposition and products.
Learn effective sales approaches by riding along with experienced Account Managers.
Enter and process customer orders and respond to performance feedback.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in a related discipline. Certification may be required in some areas. Generally 0-2 years of experience in a related field OR MS/MA and generally 0-1 year of experience in a related field.
